posts.content:
The Arcane Spell-Battery (Sorcerer 21 / Wizard 18 / Cleric 1)

I've combined a few ideas here:

- Thaxll'ssyllia, in his Arcane Spammer build suggested a Sorcerer 21 / Wizard 18 build with one level of paladin for good saves, for an epic spell (I chose Epic Mage Armor for PvM)
- Mick Dagger's and avarielo's suggestions for spell penetration feats in the same thread
- Yunim's ideal stopping points for gaining level 9 spells with capped spell casting stats (24,->36 32->44, 40->52). I choose 24 for both spell books here.
- My idea for Cleric 1 on Sorcerers for Animal Domain, Heavy Armor Proficiency/Shield Proficiency (if spellsword equipment drops), Divine Shield, Cleric scroll/wand and equipment usage -> dropping the Paladin 1 level

Spell penetration is 27+1d20 (sorc) and 24+1d20 (wiz). Everything is dispel-able sadly, except EMA and Divine Shield.

I was really interested in calculating how many spells / day (non cantrips) this mage might get.

Sorcerer 20 Base Spells / day: 6 6 6 6 6 6 6 6 6
Specialist Wizard 18 Base Spells / day: 5 5 5 5 5 5 4 4 3
Total base spells / day: 11 11 11 11 11 11 10 10 9

Ability modifier Cha 36 (capped), bonus spells / day: 4 3 3 3 3 2 2 2 2
Ability modifier Int 36 (capped), bonus spells / day: 4 3 3 3 3 2 2 2 2

Total spells / day: 19 17 17 17 17 15 14 14 13 plus one epic spell and 2-4 cleric 1 spells = 148 spells / day plus 13 cantrips and as many scrolls as one wishes.

Possible IGMS, emp IGMS or max IGMS / day = 42 / day.

Possible Bigby 6, ext Bigby 6, ext Bigby 7 and Bigby 9 / day = 56 / day

Possible Evards / day = 63 / day

Possible MM, emp MM, max MM / day = 53 / day

Divine Shield (+7-13 dodge AC) + Haste (+4 dodge AC) + Mage Armor (+1 dodge AC) + Epic Mage Armor (+5 dodge AC) 
= +20 Dodge AC cap hit with either +6 to Cha or +3 dodge AC boots.


For the Sorc 21 / Wizard 18 split there was one other level I could add:
- Paladin 1 would have great saves.
- Cleric 1 could have empowered summons and other features
- Monk 1 grants evasion and a tumble dump
- One more Sorcerer level (for Sorc 22) I could squeeze in another epic spell (ie epic warding)

I put Wis to 11 for remove fear casting 2-4x / day (depending on how much wis bonus the character has from items), which seems handy if ones summons or teammates gets feared 
Feels silly but interesting. Endure elements or prot v alignment or even summon I->II is also provided.
I could have dropped this perhaps and put silent/still spell in the build.
